course_description: This course will develop understanding of design, conduct, and analysis of field trials and intervention studies. The course will focus on methods relevant to community and facility-based trials in resource poor settings. However, several skills covered in this course will also be applicable to field and clinical trials in developed countries.
schedule_location: W 1pm-2:50pm in Grace Crum Rollins P45
sections: Class Nbr: 3181, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: W 1-2:50p, Instructor: R. Bednarczyk, Status: Open
